column5: Looks like 6 of us going to Easey Point using Hawk Air from WAWA. Of the 6 of us, I am the only one who's ever fished in Canada, and I've never even done a fly-in before. We are beyond excited.. can't wait to hit the water late May!
Nice! I am sure you and your friends will have a blast!! Make sure you're all prepared for the weather. Never know what's going to happen in May.Looking forward to your report next year.Cheers.
